content: the wtf scarf is made with 2 colors of king cole luxury yak dk weight yarn and a 5 mm h crochet hook it uses the easy larksfoot stitch made with double_crochet and chain stitches the result is a soft eye-catching scarf with great drape **grab the free pattern from my website or purchase the ad-free pdf right here on ravelry ** **join the cal newsletter here ** https //oombawkadesigncrochet ck page/0fde95d68d this is just one of the patterns included in our scarf of the month club collection > this pattern will be available as a > free pdf download until april 21 2025 > at 11 59 pm est new york time > 23 59 for cal participants simply > add the pattern to your cart before > 11 59 pm est on april 21st and it will > show as $0 00 the free pattern will be available on my blog beginning on april 20 2025 at 9 00 pm est new york time 21 00 > this pattern is available for free on > my website which is monetized by ads > if you prefer an ad-free version of > the pattern it is available to > purchase from my pattern shop ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ **newsletter ** https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2025 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
